long_description: The Salomon XT One Hydration belt keeps your running essentials and water bottle right at your hip so you can focus on the race. Water bottle pocket sits at a 45deg angle, making access to fluids easy; included water bottle holds 20 fl. oz. Also features a removable flask holder, perfect for stowing your energy-gel-filled flask. Durable nylon fabric stands up to wear and tear; supportive mesh waistbelt is breathable to keep you cool during high-octane activities. Quick-fit belt offers easy adjustments for a custom fit. Zippered pocket is sized for keys, ID, energy snacks and other small essentials.
